Text.Page: (You find a scout report on the corpse. If other scouts came to Argon Corpus, they may have similar reports.)
(You find a scout report on the corpse.)
(You find a scout report on the corpse.)
(You find a scout report. Unlike the other scouts, this one died in fetal position, as if trying to protect the report.)
What's this? A report written by the rangers we sent...oh, no. They aren't coming back, are they?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"The argons used screams as weapons."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

This is the essence of what killed them? Chilling.

This may be useful to us, .

Perhaps we can use this essence to develop a countermeasure. Or maybe even use it as a weapon ourselves someday.
